definition: to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician

lit. almanac from years back (idiom)/obsolete practice/old-fashioned principle
to live in luxury/lit. to ride a solid carriage pulled by fat horses
rooted to the spot (idiom); too terrified to move
jade garden of celestial ruler/paradise
